nodes.text: The Daranc system was a star system that was located within the Meram sector, a part of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories and New Territories regions. The system shared its name with the Daranc Run hyperlane.
The Daranc system was established in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square O-4.
